purpose: Defines weight categories used by the Motive Weighting Unit (IU-MOTIVE_WEIGHTING) during interpretation.

survival_dominance.description: How strongly survival orientation overrides reward motives.

reward_dominance.description: How strongly reward motives override caution or avoidance.

stress_amplification.description: How much stress signals increase motive intensity.

identity_alignment.description: How motive expression is strengthened when aligned with identity construction mode.

emotional_modulation.description: How emotional processing style dampens or heightens motive expression.

notes: Weights remain unpopulated until Phase 4 where actual numerical models are created.
